setup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hospital;
CREATE TABLE hospital (id INT, name VARCHAR(100), type VARCHAR(50), state VARCHAR(50), district VARCHAR(50));
INSERT INTO hospital (id, name, type, state, district) VALUES (1, 'Patna Medical College', 'Government', 'Bihar', 'Patna');
INSERT INTO hospital (id, name, type, state, district) VALUES (2, 'AIIMS Delhi', 'Government', 'Delhi', 'New Delhi');
INSERT INTO hospital (id, name, type, state, district) VALUES (3, 'Fortis Hospital Mumbai', 'Private', 'Maharashtra', 'Mumbai');
INSERT INTO hospital (id, name, type, state, district) VALUES (4, 'Nalanda District Hospital', 'Government', 'Bihar', 'Nalanda');
INSERT INTO hospital (id, name, type, state, district) VALUES (5, 'Max Hospital', 'Private', 'Bihar', 'Patna');
query: SELECT name FROM hospital WHERE type = 'Government' AND state = 'Bihar';
